name: Omegle - Dark Night
description:
A dark, low-contrast (good for night-time) theme for Omegle.com. Features:
  • a dark background and pleasing color-scheme,
  • alternating text-color to differentiate each person,
  • shortened "Stranger" to "S" and "You" to "Y" for chat consistency,
  • stripped the page of superfluous and distracting elements (e.g. logo).
